attributes.action: Deselect all MP's who refuse to represent the will of their constituents
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is failing in it's duty to defend Democracy and abide by the result of the Referendum. It is even ignoring it's own failure by allowing "Remainer" M.P's to push their own agenda via a coup d'état, despite their failure to represent majority Leave voting Constituencies.
attributes.background: Parliamentary Law states there can be no taxation without representation, yet dozens of M.P's from all parties deliberately disenfranchise their own constituents to push their own agenda. This is completely undemocratic and the Speaker of the House should have put a stop to it a long time ago.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
